#summary Boolean functions supported by Google Refine Expression Language (GREL)

==Boolean functions==

===`and(boolean b1, boolean b2, ...)`===

Logically AND one or more booleans to yield a boolean.

{{{
and(value.contains("Mr."),value.contains("Mrs."))
}}}

===`or(boolean b1, boolean b2, ...)`===

Logically OR one or more booleans to yield a boolean.

{{{
or(value.endsWith("School"),value.endsWith("Schools"))
}}}
===`not(boolean b)`===

Logically NOT a boolean to yield another boolean.

{{{
not(or(value.endsWith("Reef"),value.endsWith("Reefs"),value.endsWith("reef"),value.endsWith("reefs")))
}}}

===`hasField(o, string name)`===

returns a boolean. Returns whether o has field name.
